Email Sign-up Contact Us Get Involved Join Our Operations Team Join Our Box Office Team News Advertise with Us My Account About The Barbara B. Mann Performing Arts Hall at FSW The Barbara B. Mann Performing Arts Hall at FSW features the largest proscenium stage in Southwest Florida; and is a 1,874-seat facility that presents National Touring Broadway musicals such as: The Phantom of the Opera, Disney’s The Lion King, Les Misérables, WICKED, Jersey Boys, The Radio City Christmas Spectacular starring The Rockettes® and The Book of Mormon. Additionally, the Mann Hall is host to prominent entertainers, dance performances, popular ensembles and classical music concerts year-round. The venue is also available for business conferences, seminars, meetings and wedding receptions, with dining availability. Barbara B. Email Sign-up Contact Us Get Involved Join Our Operations Team Join Our Box Office Team News Advertise with Us My Account Book Your Event Barbara B. Mann Performing Arts Hall at FSW is a first-class facility hosting world-class touring Broadway musicals, plays, contemporary acts and concerts. We offer full-service theatre rentals for presentations, events and more. To assure that your event is one of a kind, we will provide both beverage and catering service as well as room set-up and design if requested. We also have access to numerous vendors that can supply your event with that special touch from flowers and ice sculptures to chocolate fountains and dessert trays. The following information is designed to give you an overview of the services we have available as well as the resources you may need for your upcoming event. To rent the Theatre for your upcoming event, contact Scott Saxon at 239-489-3033 To have a reception or private function, contact Karen Hutto at 239-489-3033 ext.3072 Rental Rates Available Spaces Catering & Beverage Services Tickets Fifth Third Bank Broadway Events Your Official Ticket Provider Buy Tickets How to Buy Seating Charts Group Sales Gift Cards Season Tickets President's Club Visit Us Directions & Parking FAQ Accessibility Security Playbills About Barbara B.
